subject: Mixed Martial Arts
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: A spokeswoman for the promoter Ringside MMA said Donald Brashear, a former N.H.L. enforcer, had a deal to try cage-fighting.
snippet: A spokeswoman for the promoter Ringside MMA said Donald Brashear, a former N.H.L. enforcer, had a deal to try cage-fighting.
